data.text:
RAYMONDVILLE - Raul Arevalo Jr., 81, entered into eternal rest on Friday, December 18, 2020 at Valley Baptist Medical Center in Harlingen, Texas. He was born on August 22, 1939 at El Sauz Ranch in Raymondville, Texas to Raul Arevalo and Antonia Renaud Arevalo. He is survived by his sons, Jonathan Michael Arevalo, John Roy Arevalo, and Raul Arevalo III, [â€¦]
